languages.text: "А теперь, дитя, нам с тобой пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое". {n}Иссохшая ладонь, покрытая прозрачными кожистыми перепонками, протягивается в сторону Кассии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А теперь, дитя, нам с тобой пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое". {n}Иссохшая ладонь, покрытая прозрачными кожистыми перепонками, протягивается в сторону Кассии.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А теперь, дитя, нам с тобой пора отправляться в твой новый дом, дабы закончить начатое". {n}Иссохшая ладонь, покрытая прозрачными кожистыми перепонками, протягивается в сторону Кассии.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Now come, child, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started." {n}A desiccated palm covered with translucent leathery membranes stretches out toward Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Now come, child, it is time we depart to your new home so we can finish what we started." {n}A desiccated palm covered with translucent leathery membranes stretches out toward Cassia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “来吧，孩子，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”{n}他向卡西娅伸出了干瘪的手，手上覆盖着半透明的皮膜。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “来吧，孩子，是时候动身去你的新家了。这样一来，我们来这里的目的，就可以实现了。”{n}他向卡西娅伸出了干瘪的手，手上覆盖着半透明的皮膜。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Ahora ven, pequeña. Es hora de que partas para tu nuevo hogar, para terminar lo que hemos empezado». {n}Estira su mano marchita, cubierta de membranas coriáceas, hacia Cassia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ahora ven, pequeña. Es hora de que partas para tu nuevo hogar, para terminar lo que hemos empezado». {n}Estira su mano marchita, cubierta de membranas coriáceas, hacia Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「さあ、我が子よ、新しい家へ出発する時だ。そこで、我らが始めたことを終わらせるのだ」{n}彼は、半透明の革のような膜で覆われた枯れた手をカシアに向かって伸ばした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「さあ、我が子よ、新しい家へ出発する時だ。そこで、我らが始めたことを終わらせるのだ」{n}彼は、半透明の革のような膜で覆われた枯れた手をカシアに向かって伸ばした。{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Kommt nun, Kind, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben." {n}Er streckt seine vertrocknete Hand, die mit durchsichtigen, lederartigen Membranen bedeckt ist, nach Cassia aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Kommt nun, Kind, es ist Zeit für die Abreise in Eure neue Heimat, damit wir beenden können, was wir begonnen haben." {n}Er streckt seine vertrocknete Hand, die mit durchsichtigen, lederartigen Membranen bedeckt ist, nach Cassia aus.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Et maintenant, Enfant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer afin de finir ce que nous avons commencé. » {n}Il tend une main flétrie couverte de membranes translucides vers Cassia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et maintenant, mon enfant, venez. Il est temps de rejoindre votre nouveau foyer afin de finir ce que nous avons commencé. » {n}Il tend une main flétrie couverte de membranes translucides vers Cassia.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Gel çocuğum, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek." {n}Derimsi, yarı saydam bir zarla kaplı kuru elini Cassia'ya doğru uzatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Now come, child, it is time we departed for your new home, so that we may finish what we started." {n}He stretches out his withered hand, covered with translucent leathery membranes, toward Cassia.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Gel çocuğum, yeni evine gitmemiz ve başladığımız şeyi bitirmemiz gerek." {n}Derimsi yarı saydam bir zarla kaplı kuru elini Cassia'ya doğru uzatıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
